name: clarity-usage-analytics
description: Query macOS usage analytics from the Clarity app - track app usage, focus sessions, and productivity metrics
long_description:
Clarity Usage Analytics provides Claude with access to your macOS usage data collected by the Clarity app. Query daily statistics, app usage patterns, focus sessions, and productivity metrics to gain insights into how you spend your time on your Mac.

## Features
- Get daily usage summaries including active time, keystrokes, and clicks
- Query app usage statistics and see which apps you use most
- Access focus session data to understand your deep work patterns
- View hourly breakdowns of your activity
- Track productivity trends over time

tools.name: get_today_summary
tools.description: Get today's usage summary including active time, keystrokes, clicks, and focus time

tools.name: get_daily_stats
tools.description: Get daily usage statistics for a specific date or date range

tools.name: get_top_apps
tools.description: Get the most-used apps for a specific date, ranked by active time

tools.name: get_hourly_breakdown
tools.description: Get an hourly breakdown of activity for a specific date

tools.name: get_focus_sessions
tools.description: Get focus/deep work sessions for a specific date

tools.name: get_app_usage
tools.description: Get detailed usage statistics for a specific app

tools.name: get_weekly_summary
tools.description: Get a summary of usage statistics for the past week

tools.name: get_productivity_trends
tools.description: Analyze productivity trends over a specified period
